title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.271 - Provider
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.271 - Provider

State Regulations

An individual or institution which gives medical care. Institutional providers include a hospital, skilled nursing facility and
intermediate care facility. Individual providers include individuals
(physicians, dentists, etc.) who practice independently of institutional
providers and whose primary activity is the provision of health care to
individuals. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
441.271

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
